about_the_game:
This soundtrack expansion includes 20 original tracks used in the game 'Go For a Punch! Saki Sanobashi.' Relive the most unsettling scenes of the game while enjoying these melodies for free.

Music is an essential element in 'Go For a Punch! Saki Sanobashi', and with this DLC, you can carry the game's unique atmosphere with you wherever you go.

Music Style:
They embrace the horror genre, dancing between melodic despair and a rusty 8-bit.
